page.title: 10RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME
page.content: Anyone who lives in Beckton lives near the park. We all have bikes and spend a lot of time riding them in the park or around the roads. Some of us do B.M.X. on the track. The park is pretty busy with football matches and training, cricket, rounders, tennis, bowls, kite flying, childrens games and perhaps a few squabbles or fights. Every day except Sunday we can go to a club in the park pavillion for pool, table tennis and all sorts of board games. There is another club twice a week where we can make things, play games, see films, go on outings and sometimes even go camping. Some girls enjoy dancing classes, boys bowing, and both do martial arts. We also go to Guides or Scouts. A lot of boys go fishing.
